archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Workforce Management Schedule
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process is responsible for keeping the schedule of available workforce actualized, recalculating the availability schedule, and synchronizing actual workforce schedules with third parties based on information about reserved and available units.

properties.value: This process is responsible for keeping the schedule of the available workforce actualized, recalculating the availability schedule and synchronizing actual workforce schedules with third parties based on information about reserved and available units.
